title: PUMA Women's Adelina Sneaker
breadCrumbs: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry › Women › Shoes › Fashion Sneakers
description: Adelina is our ballerina silhouette perfectly supporting your sporty lifestyle! A feminine curved unisole injected EVA outsole is paired with a very sporty and lightweight upper. With its deconstructed neoprene heel material Adelina is very easy to put on. The elastic cross straps help to support the foot and the air mesh upper is breathable during warm temperatures. The SoftFoam+ sockliner provides superior cushioning and optimal comfort for every step of your day.

title: PUMA Women's Carina Sneaker
breadCrumbs: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry › Women › Shoes › Fashion Sneakers

The highlight of the shoe is the new cupsole tooling though with a slightly elevated platform sole with texture interest in toe and heel area and cat branding in the medial. The SoftFoam+ sockliner provides superior cushioning and optimal comfort for every step of your day.

breadCrumbs: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry › Men › Shoes › Athletic › Fitness & Cross-Training
description: Up your game with Axelion. The knitted upper combines with a TPU shank in the midfoot for support and control through movements. The Axelion is a true game changer for everyday comfortable training shoes. Details knit upper extended lacing system for secure fit and feel TPU shank in the midfoot offers support and control through heel split outsole design provides arch support and shock absorption in the heel Full rubber outsole provides traction and grip.

title: PUMA Men's Tuff Moccasin Slipper
breadCrumbs: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry › Men › Shoes › Slippers
description: Feel at home anywhere with the new Tuff Mocc Cat moccasin from PUMA. With its soft fur lining this cozy moccasin will make you feel at home in and out of the house. You can go anywhere thanks to its slip-resistant full rubber outsole. Experience feeling at home anywhere!

title: PUMA Men's Fusion Evo Golf Shoe
breadCrumbs: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry › Men › Shoes › Athletic › Golf
description: The engendered mesh bootie construction upper wraps the foot comfortably while the lacing system is integrated with TPU Heel Clip and Webbing Support Strap provide a locked in fit. Whether you're on the course or at a barbecue you will be ready to go.

title: PUMA Men's Ignite Fasten8 Golf Shoe
breadCrumbs: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry › Men › Shoes › Athletic › Golf
description: The TPU structure of the PWR Cage helps provide unparalleled support around the midfoot while the laces integrated webbing straps help wrap the midfoot for a secure fit. The Flat-Knit Mesh upper combined with PWR Frame TPU overlays provide a breathable and 1 year waterproof warranty that be sure to will turn heads. On top of a full-length IGNITE Foam midsole, wrapped in Sole Shield for added durability, provides unparalleled comfort and energy return to help you feel and play your best all day long. While the outsole utilizes a Pro-Form TPU outsole with an ORGANICALLY-ALTERED TRACTION pattern. The innovative materials and progressive design provide the performance you need on the course and the style you need while off it.

title: ASICS Men's Gel-Venture 7
breadCrumbs: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry › Men › Shoes › Athletic › Running › Trail Running
description: Take on the toughest terrain in confidence with the men's GEL-VENTURE 7 performance trail running shoe by ASICS. Featuring GEL technology and an EVA midsole, this shoe is made for athletes who love to run in the great outdoors. GEL technology in the rearfoot area of the shoe provides shock absorption where you need it most, while the ORTHOLITE sockliner provides an additional layer of cushioning underfoot. It even molds to the shape of your feet, making each run even more comfortable than the last. Extra support comes from the sturdy upper crafted from synthetic leather, while the internal heel counter gently helps your foot remain in its natural line of motion, making for a more efficient stride. Meanwhile the EVA midsole protects your feet against impact and increases rebound, giving you an energetic feeling as you clock up the miles. Durable and practical, the GEL-VENTURE 7 shoe makes an excellent training partner whether you're new to trail running or a seasoned pro.

title: PUMA Men's Aviator Profoam Sky Running Shoe
breadCrumbs: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry › Men › Shoes › Athletic › Running › Road Running
description: The AVIATOR offers comfort elements that are rare in this space. The engineered mesh is a big winner especially when combined with a full performance midsole offering PROFOAMLITE.  Cushioning combines with solid outsole biomechanics, including a decoupled heel, and midfoot dividing line, to give long lasting high end performance.

title: PUMA Men's Twitch Runner Trail Sneaker
breadCrumbs: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry › Men › Shoes › Athletic › Running › Trail Running
description: The Twitch Runner Trail adds a trailized twist to the Twitch Runner franchise. We’ve now added a lugged rubber outsole increasing traction for all of your trail needs. The tooling is equipped with plenty of cushion. The upper features a closed Ripstop material with trailized details throughout the shoe such as webbings, PU skins, and zig zag stitching.El Twitch Runner Trail añade un giro remolcado a la franquicia de Twitch Runner. La parte superior cuenta con un material Ripstop cerrado con detalles remolcados en todo el zapato como correas, pieles de poliuretano y costuras en zigzag.

title: PUMA Women's Softride Sophia Running Shoe

description: Excited to expand our Softride platform this season with a new women’s point of view- introducing the Softride Sophia. title: PUMA Unisex-Child Twitch Runner Trail Alternate Closure+ Sneaker
breadCrumbs: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry › Men › Shoes › Athletic › Running › Trail Running
description: The Twitch Runner Trail adds a trailized twist to the Twitch Runner franchise. Still on the same last as Run PUMA's popular Velocity Nitro, we’ve now added a lugged rubber outsole increasing traction for all of your trail needs. The tooling has a bold paint line for statement colors, and it's equipped with plenty of cushion. The upper features a closed Ripstop material with trailized details throughout the shoe such as webbings, PU skins, and zig zag stitching. The FORMSTRIP is featured on both medial and lateral sides of the shoe for unique branding and exciting colorways.
